title: my league client is broken
body: when i open league client it wont let me log on it says we're unable to log you in because you may be offline and im not and then sometimes it tries to update without success even when it opens the play button is blanked out and it says to restart i have tried reinstalling it,  and other things that have been suggested to other users but none work i want to be able to play lol help.

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is blocking you from our services, but I can help!  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use it to auto -configure your firewall settings in case that may be the culprit.  If the issue persists, though, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help clear up these blocks.   I hope that helps!
